			(function (url) {
				var
				isSSL = document.location.protocol === 'https:',
				r7adUrl = (isSSL ? 'https:' : 'http:') + '//adv.r7.com/script?href=',
				pageUrl = (typeof url === 'undefined' ? document.location.href : url);

			<li class="ac-gn-item ac-gn-item-menu ac-gn-search" role="search">
				<a class="ac-gn-link ac-gn-link-search" href="/kb/index?page=search&locale=pt_BR" data-analytics-title="search" data-analytics-click="search" aria-label="Buscar em apple.com">
					<span class="ac-gn-search-placeholder" aria-hidden="true">Buscar em apple.com</span></a>
			</li>
			<li class="ac-gn-item ac-gn-bag" id="ac-gn-bag">
				<a class="ac-gn-link ac-gn-link-bag analytics-exitlink" href="https://www.apple.com/br/shop/goto/bag" data-analytics-title="bag" data-analytics-click="bag" aria-label="Sacola" data-string-badge="Sacola com itens"><span class="ac-gn-link-text">Sacola</span><span class="ac-gn-bag-badge" aria-hidden="true"></span></a>
				<span class="ac-gn-bagview-caret ac-gn-bagview-caret-large"></span>
			</li>
		</ul>
		<aside id="ac-gn-searchview" class="ac-gn-searchview" role="search" data-analytics-region="search">
			<div class="ac-gn-searchview-content">
				<form id="ac-gn-searchform" class="ac-gn-searchform" action="//www.apple.com/br/search" method="get">
					<div class="ac-gn-searchform-wrapper">
						<input id="ac-gn-searchform-input" class="ac-gn-searchform-input" type="text" aria-label="Buscar em apple.com" placeholder="Buscar em apple.com" data-placeholder-long="Buscar produtos, lojas e ajuda." autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" autocomplete="off" spellcheck="false" />
						<input id="ac-gn-searchform-src" type="hidden" name="src" value="globalnav" />
						<button id="ac-gn-searchform-submit" class="ac-gn-searchform-submit" type="submit" disabled aria-label="Enviar"></button>
						<button id="ac-gn-searchform-reset" class="ac-gn-searchform-reset" type="reset" disabled aria-label="Limpar busca"></button>
					</div>
				</form>
				<aside id="ac-gn-searchresults" class="ac-gn-searchresults" data-string-quicklinks="Links rápidos" data-string-suggestions="Sugestões de busca" data-string-noresults="Pressione enter para buscar"></aside>
			</div>
			<button id="ac-gn-searchview-close" class="ac-gn-searchview-close" aria-label="Fechar busca">
					<span class="ac-gn-searchview-close-wrapper">
						<span class="ac-gn-searchview-close-left"></span>
						<span class="ac-gn-searchview-close-right"></span>
					</span>
				</button>
		</aside>
		<aside class="ac-gn-bagview" data-analytics-region="bag">
			<div class="ac-gn-bagview-scrim">
				<span class="ac-gn-bagview-caret ac-gn-bagview-caret-small"></span>
			</div>
			<div class="ac-gn-bagview-content" id="ac-gn-bagview-content">
			</div>
		</aside>
	</div>
</nav>
<div id="ac-gn-curtain" class="ac-gn-curtain"></div>
<div id="ac-gn-placeholder" class="ac-nav-placeholder"></div>

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://www.apple.com/ac/globalnav/3/pt_BR/scripts/ac-globalnav.built.js"></script>
<div id="supportsThreeD"></div>
	<div class="main" data-env='live' role="main">
    	<nav id="ac-localnav" class="no-js " lang="pt-BR"
			role="navigation" aria-label="Support Navigation" data-analytics-region="local nav" data-sticky>
			<div class="ac-ln-wrapper">
				<div class="ac-ln-background"></div>
				<div class="ac-ln-content">
					<span class="ac-ln-title">
                      <a href="/pt-br/" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Local Nav" data-analytics-link-component_name="Support" data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/">
									Suporte</a>
							</span>
                    </div>
			</div>
		</nav>
        <div class="pageTitle  ">
        	<h1 class="pageTitle-heading">Mapa do site de suporte</h1></div>
	<section class="as-columns as-columns--3up as-columns--simple-list">
	<div class="row"  data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Container" data-analytics-link-component_name="Simple List">
        <div class="column large-4 medium-6 small-12">
                <div class="simple-list-wrapper as-left">
					<h2>Contato</h2><ul>
    		<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Contact Apple Support" data-analytics-link-url="https://getsupport.apple.com/?caller=sitemap&amp;PRKEYS=" href="https://getsupport.apple.com/?caller=sitemap&PRKEYS=">Contato do Suporte da Apple</a></li>
				<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Apple Online Store Support" data-analytics-link-url="http://www.apple.com/br/shop/help" href="http://www.apple.com/br/shop/help">Suporte da Apple Online Store</a></li>
				<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Contact a Mobile Carrier" data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/HT204039" href="/pt-br/HT204039">Entre em contato com a operadora do celular</a></li>
				<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Support Phone Numbers" data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/HT201232" href="/pt-br/HT201232">Números de telefone do suporte</a></li>
				</ul>
	</div>
    		<div class="simple-list-wrapper as-left">
					<h2>Serviço e reparos</h2><ul>
    		<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Apple Repair Options" data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/repair" href="/pt-br/repair">Opções de reparo da Apple</a></li>

           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Set Up a Repair" data-analytics-link-url="https://getsupport.apple.com/?caller=sitemaporc&amp;PRKEYS=" href="https://getsupport.apple.com/?caller=sitemaporc&PRKEYS=">Agende um reparo</a></li>
				<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Check Repair Status" data-analytics-link-url="https://checkrepair.apple.com/br/pt/" href="https://checkrepair.apple.com/br/pt/">Verifique o status do reparo</a></li>

           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Check Service and Support Coverage" data-analytics-link-url="https://checkcoverage.apple.com/br/pt/" href="https://checkcoverage.apple.com/br/pt/">Verifique a cobertura de suporte e serviço</a></li>
				<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Apple Authorized Service Providers" data-analytics-link-url="https://locate.apple.com/br/pt/" href="https://locate.apple.com/br/pt/">Centros de Serviço Autorizado Apple (AASPs)</a></li>
				<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link analytics-exitlink" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Apple Retail Stores" data-analytics-link-url="http://www.apple.com/br/retail/" href="http://www.apple.com/br/retail/">Apple Stores</a></li>

           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Service Answer Center (FAQs)" data-analytics-link-url="https://www.apple.com/br/support/service/" href="https://www.apple.com/br/support/service/">Central de respostas sobre serviços (Perguntas frequentes)</a></li>

        <div class="column large-4 medium-6 small-12">
                <div class="simple-list-wrapper as-left">
					<h2>iOS e hardware do iOS</h2><ul>

           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="iPhone " data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/iphone" href="/pt-br/iphone"><span class="a11y">Suporte do</span>

           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="MacBook" data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/mac/macbook" href="/pt-br/mac/macbook">MacBook</a></li>

           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="MacBook Air" data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/mac/macbook-air" href="/pt-br/mac/macbook-air">MacBook Air</a></li>

           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Mac accessories" data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/mac/accessories" href="/pt-br/mac/accessories">Acessórios do Mac</a></li>

n=document.createElement("script"),n.async=!0,null!=e&&(n.id=e),n},s=function(e,n){var t,o;return o=new XMLHttpRequest,t=-1===n.indexOf(location.host)||!C(n,"/"),!t||"withCredentials"in o?o.open(e,n,!0):"undefined"!=typeof XDomainRequest?(o=new XDomainRequest,o.open(e.toLowerCase(),n)):o=null,o},o=function(){function e(){this.post=x(this.post,this),this.get=x(this.get,this),this.getJsonp=x(this.getJsonp,this),this.jsonpId=0}return e.prototype.complete=function(e,n,t,o,r,i){var s;e&&!o&&(s=e,r&&(s=JSON.stringify(e)),y.save(t,s,n)),i(e)},e.prototype.getCache=function(e,n,t){var o;return!n&&(o=y.load(e))?(t&&(o=JSON.parse(o.toString())),o):null},e.prototype.request=function(e,n,t){var o,r,i,a,c,l,u,d,p,g,f,w,m,h,b,v,y;return d=null!=t.expire&&t.expire>=0?t.expire:60,a=t.success||function(){},c=t.error||function(){},i=t.key||n,v=t.type,h=t.skipCache,b=t.timeout||null,p=null,y=t.xhrConfigsCallback,l=t.data,u=null!=t.dataType?t.dataType:v,null==v&&(v=n.split("."),v=v[v.length-1]),g="json"===v,w="json"===u,(o=this.getCache(i,h,g))?void a(o):(m=s(e,n))?(y&&"function"==typeof y&&y(m),f="undefined"!=typeof XDomainRequest&&m instanceof XDomainRequest,m.onload||(m.onload=function(e){return function(){var n;return Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m))}}(this)),m.onerror||(m.onerror=function(){return console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m)}),"GET"!==e&&l?(w&&(l=JSON.stringify(l)),f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send(l)},0):m.send(l)):f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send()},0):m.send(),b&&(r=function(){return null!=m.abort?m.abort():void 0},p=setTimeout(r,b)),m):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error","This browser does not support this operation"),c("500",m),m)},e.prototype.getJsonp=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,c,l,u;return i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script></div></div></div></div></div><div id="glb-corpo"><!-- PUBLIEDITORIAL --><!-- possui template smart --><div class='row bloco-wide'><div class="small-12 medium-12 large-12 columns"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_super"><div id="banner_super" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="row ge-destaques"><div class="gui-carousel-component-container" id="gui-carousel-highlight"><!-- PASSO 1 --><div class="gui-item-carousel"><div class="small-6 medium-6 large-6 columns gui-carousel-component-left-column"><div class="gui-headline destaque destaque-tracking destaque-box-destaque-principal-fotao-fotinha tipo-fotao glb-hl-style-fotao-base-esquerdo"><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/games/noticia/2017/03/thomas-brolynho-vence-campeao-mundial-e-avanca-na-eleague-de-sfv.html"

                width="524"

                
                    height=280
                    src="http://s2.glbimg.com/5yJTrkaRttHf_SKK__nMBu8V9Ds=/0x179:720x564/524x280/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2016/12/28/carrossel-torneios-e-sports-2017.jpg"
                

                class="gui-headline-photo" /></figure></a></div></div></div></div></div><!-- /.ge-destaques --><div class="row"><div class="small-12 medium-12 large-12 columns"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_slb"><div id="banner_slb" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><section class="ge-conteudo-principal"><div class="row"><div class="small-7 medium-7 large-7 columns"><section data-destaque-feed="destaques" class="widget-section-destaques"><section class="widget widget-plantao-semantico"><h2 class="gui-text-section-title ">últimas notícias </h2><!-- gerado em: 2017-03-28T14:43:08Z -->

<div class="gui-newsfeed-item-wrapper gui-newsfeed-item-wrapper-with-thumb"  data-isoformat="2017-03-25T00:00:03-03:00" >
    <div class="gui-image-hover">
        
            <a class="gui-newsfeed-item-thumb" href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/games/noticia/2017/03/raio-x-do-cblol-novidades-da-intz-fazem-diferenca-revolta-e-unanime.html" title="Raio-x do CBLoL: novidades da INTZ fazem diferença; Revolta é unânime" data-type="image" data-src="http://s2.glbimg.com/MnxNHKxqSHm3LzKVdupkexJ5Y0A=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/24/raios_x_cblol_intz_x_keyd_stars.jpg">
                
                    <figure class="gui-image-full">
                        <img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/MnxNHKxqSHm3LzKVdupkexJ5Y0A=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/24/raios_x_cblol_intz_x_keyd_stars.jpg" alt="Raio-x do CBLoL: novidades da INTZ fazem diferença; Revolta é unânime">
                    </figure>
                
            </a>
        

        
            
                <p class="gui-text-headline"><stronggames</strong></p>
            
        

        <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/games/noticia/2017/03/raio-x-do-cblol-novidades-da-intz-fazem-diferenca-revolta-e-unanime.html" title="Raio-x do CBLoL: novidades da INTZ fazem diferença; Revolta é unânime" class="gui-color-primary-link gui-feed-title" data-href="https://glo.bo/2off65t" data-type="image" data-src="http://s2.glbimg.com/MnxNHKxqSHm3LzKVdupkexJ5Y0A=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/24/raios_x_cblol_intz_x_keyd_stars.jpg">
            <h3 class="gui-text-title ">Raio-x do CBLoL: novidades da INTZ fazem diferença; Revolta é unânime</h3>
        </a>

        

        
            <p class="gui-text-datetime" >
                
                    0:00 - 25/03/2017
                
            </p>
        

        <div class="share-bar plantao-share" data-theme="minimal" data-url="https://glo.bo/2off65t" data-title="Raio-x do CBLoL: novidades da INTZ fazem diferença; Revolta é unânime" data-image-url="http://s2.glbimg.com/MnxNHKxqSHm3LzKVdupkexJ5Y0A=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/24/raios_x_cblol_intz_x_keyd_stars.jpg"></div>
    </div>
</div>

var SVCPesquisaConfig = {};
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_pesquisa = "1181961";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_embed = "1f2eac6aa132";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app = "pesquisa.globosat.globo.com";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirJquery = false;
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirTrackEvents = 'UA-16233545-1';

var SVCPesquisaDone = false;

var SVCPesquisaLoad = document.createElement("script");
    SVCPesquisaLoad.type = "text/javascript";
    SVCPesquisaLoad.async = true;

SVCPesquisaLoad.onreadystatechange = function() {

var SVCPesquisaState;

if(!SVCPesquisaDone){

    SVCPesquisaState = SVCPesquisaLoad.readyState;

    if(SVCPesquisaState === "complete") {
            SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
        }
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.onload = function(){
    if(!SVCPesquisaDone){
        SVCPesquisaDone = true;
        SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.src = 'http://' + SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app + '/app.min.js';

var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(SVCPesquisaLoad, s);

	<div class="header">
		<div class="inn">
			<div class="logo"></div>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div id="main">

		<div id="page1">
			<div class="casting"></div>
			<div class="inn">
				<div class="chamada">
					<h1>RECORDTV HD</h1>
					<h2>Conteúdo com mais qualidade,<br>sem nenhum custo<br>para você!</h2>
				</div>
				<div class="mouse">
					<div class="mouse-arrow"></div>
				</div>
			</div><!--/inn-->
		</div><!--/page1-->

		<div id="page2">
			<div class="videos">
				<div class="carousel cf">
					
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="controler cf">
				<div class="nav-arrow left-nav disabled"></div>
				<div class="nav-arrow right-nav"></div>
				<div class="dotstyle dotstyle-fillin">
					<ul></ul>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div><!--/page2-->

		<div id="page6">
			<div class="group">
				<h1>A TV Digital</h1>
				<h2>Vantagens</h2>
				<div class="tv"></div>
				<div class="cf">
					<div class="nitidez">
						<h3>Nitidez e definição</h3>
						<p>Assistir a TV digital com um televisor de alta definição, significa receber imagens perfeitas. São até seis vezes mais nitidez e definição do que a transmissão analógica atual. Para isso seu televisor precisa ter uma resolução Full HD ou superior.</p>
					</div>
					<div class="qualidade">
						<h3>Qualidade e efeitos sonoros</h3>
						<p>Enquanto no padrão analógico o som é estéreo, no digital é possível recebê-lo em Surround 5.1. Isso quer dizer que o som é entregue em cinco canais diferentes e um exclusivo para efeitos especiais. Mas lembre-se: para isso seu televisor deve ser compatível com a tecnologia ou possuir um sistema de som exclusivo, como um Home Teather.</p>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="cf">	
					<div class="mobilidade">
						<h3>Mobilidade</h3>
						<p>Com a TV digital é possível assitir seu programa favorito em qualquer lugar! Seja no carro, ônibus ou andando, basta ter um smartphone, mini TV ou aparelho compatível.</p>
					</div>
					<div class="interatividade">
						<h3>Interatividade</h3>
						<p>Com a DTVi você pode ver informações sobre o programa que está sendo transmitido, como sinópses, horário de inicio, tempo de duração e muito mais!</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div><!--/page6-->
		<div class="gradiente-fio"></div>

		<div id="page3">
			<div class="txt">
				<div class="txtInn">
					<h1>O Sinal Digital a seu alcance</h1>
					<p>A Record TV já está operando com o sinal digital em diversas regiões do país. Confira no mapa se a sua região já está aproveitando dessa tecnologia.</p>
					<p class="respCenter"><strong>Aprenda a sintonizar o sinal digital em sua TV</strong></p>
					<div>
						<a href="http://player.r7.com/video/i/56f44129490f8c265101a096?layout=wide432p&autoPlay=true" class="video-tutorial" data-featherlight="iframe" data-featherlight-iframe-width="768" data-featherlight-iframe-height="432">
							<img src="http://vtb.r7.com/399566/2016/03/24/56f44129490f8c265101a096/f739bc9f20b9486ba4ca0fc35ef38d95__Veja_como_assistir___programa__o_da_Record_em_alta_defini__o_e_de_gra_a__thumb_thumb.jpg" alt="">
							<div class="video-overlay"></div>
							<div class="play-btn"></div>

					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="map">
				<div class="mapInn cf">

            	<div class="coluna esquerda">
        	<h1 class="titulo">Cursos Gratuitos</h1>
                        <ul class="lista clearfix">
            	                	            	<li>
                	<a href="cursos/gratuitos/atualidades"><img src="//www.federalconcursos.com.br/imagens/turmas/atualidades.jpg" alt="" /></a>
                        <p class="curso-nome"><a href="cursos/gratuitos/atualidades">Atualidades para Concurso Público 2016 - Ondemand</a></p>
                                                <p class="curso-data">
							                            <a href="cursos/gratuitos/atualidades">Tempo de acesso: 60 dias</a>
                                                    </p>
                        <p class="curso-detalhes"><a href="cursos/gratuitos/atualidades">+ detalhes do curso</a></p>
                                            </a>
                </li>
                	                                	            	<li>

<!-- Início - Analytics R7 -->
<script type="text/javascript">

 

(function() {

 

    (function(i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {

        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r;

        i[r] = i[r] || function() {

            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)

        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date();

        a = s.createElement(o), m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];

        a.async = 1;

        a.src = g;

        m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)

    })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-10631407-1', 'auto');

 

    var dataLayer = omnitureObject;

 

    dataLayer = (typeof dataLayer !== 'undefined') ? dataLayer : {};

    if (dataLayer.page_name) {ga('set', 'dimension1', dataLayer.page_name); }

    if (dataLayer.site_section) {ga('set', 'dimension2', dataLayer.site_section); }

    if (dataLayer.sub_section) {ga('set', 'dimension3', dataLayer.sub_section); }

    if (dataLayer.sub_section_2) {ga('set', 'dimension4', dataLayer.sub_section_2); }

    if (dataLayer.sub_section_3) {ga('set', 'dimension5', dataLayer.sub_section_3); }

    if (dataLayer.content_id) {ga('set', 'dimension6', dataLayer.content_id); }

    if (dataLayer.content_type) {ga('set', 'dimension7', dataLayer.content_type); }

    if (dataLayer.content_title) {ga('set', 'dimension8', dataLayer.content_title); }

    if (dataLayer. data_publicacao) {ga('set', 'dimension9', dataLayer.publication_date); }

    dataLayer.page_url = document.location.href;

    if (dataLayer.short_url) {ga('set', 'dimension11', dataLayer.short_url); }

    if (dataLayer.tailt_age) {ga('set', 'dimension12', dataLayer.tailt_age); }

    if (dataLayer.tailt_gender) {ga('set', 'dimension13', dataLayer.tailt_gender); }

    if (dataLayer.tailt_city) {ga('set', 'dimension14', dataLayer.tailt_city); }

    if (dataLayer.tailt_state) {ga('set', 'dimension15', dataLayer.tailt_state); }

    if (dataLayer.tailt_country) {ga('set', 'dimension16', dataLayer.tailt_country); }

    if (dataLayer.tailt_profiles) {ga('set', 'dimension17', dataLayer.tailt_profiles); }

    if (dataLayer.tailt_subjetcs) {ga('set', 'dimension18', dataLayer.tailt_subjetcs); }

    if (dataLayer.minute) {ga('set', 'dimension19', dataLayer.minute); }

    if (dataLayer.embed_photoGallery) {ga('set', 'dimension20', dataLayer.embed_photoGallery); }

    if (dataLayer.embed_poll) {ga('set', 'dimension21', dataLayer.embed_poll); }

    if (dataLayer.embed_quiz) {ga('set', 'dimension22', dataLayer.embed_quiz); }

    if (dataLayer.embed_playlist) {ga('set', 'dimension23', dataLayer.embed_playlist); }

    dataLayer.reset_content_id = function(content_id) {

        dataLayer.content_id = content_id;

        ga('set', 'dimension6', dataLayer.content_id);

    }

    dataLayer.reset_content_type = function(content_type) {

        dataLayer.content_type = content_type;

        ga('set', 'dimension7', dataLayer.content_type);

    }

    ga('send', 'pageview');

    var adblock_status = (Boolean(document.getElementById('ads-container-r7adv'))) ? 'OFF' : 'ON';

    ga('send', 'event', 'Adblock', 'Adblock-' + adblock_status, {

        nonInteraction: true

    });

})();

</script>
<!-- Fim - Analytics R7 -->
 

<!-- Begin comScore Tag -->
<script>
var _comscore = _comscore || [];
_comscore.push({ c1: "2", c2: "14194541",ns_site:"portal-r7",name: omnitureObject.page_name.replace(/:/g,".") ,channel: omnitureObject.site_section.replace(/:/g,"."), content_source:"parceiros" });
(function() {
	var s = document.createElement("script"),
		el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
	s.async = true;
	s.src = (document.location.protocol == "https:" ? "https://sb" : "http://b") + ".scorecardresearch.com/beacon.js";
	el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
</script>
<noscript>
	<img src="http://b.scorecardresearch.com/p?c1=2&c2=14194541&cv=2.0&cj=1" />
</noscript>
<!-- End comScore Tag -->

<script type="text/javascript">
/* call function and request anametrix */

	loadAnametrix(omnitureObject);
}
</script>
 #end anametrix -->

</html>
